column1: #Text=I have never known my brother to regret anything .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Did you listen to Azula ?
#Text=Father 's realized how important family is to him !
#Text=" Iroh says : " I care about you !
#Text=And if Ozai wants you back , well , I think it may not be for the reasons you imagine .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You do n't know how my father feels about me .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Zuko , I only meant that in our family , things are not always what they seem .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I think you are exactly what you seem !
#Text=A lazy , mistrustful , shallow old man who 's always been jealous of his brother !
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't think we should be trying to bring on the Avatar State .
#Text=" Aang says : " Do you think the general will be mad ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " What can he say ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Family sticks together , right ?
